name: WP MJPostKiller
author: M.Shahbazi

sections.description:
This plugin will delte posts on-the-fly if title of posts similar to expression that admins defined before .
Please feel free to offer any feature suggestions you might have and I will consider them for future releases.
sections.installation:
Take the easy route and install through the WordPress plugin adder OR :

  1. Download the .zip file and upload the unzipped folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. WP-FixTag should automatically be added to your site and WordPress.

short_description: This plugin will delte posts on-the-fly if title of posts similar to expression that admins defined before .
